name: fullstackopen2020-osa3
description: An exercise project for a uni course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen2020/osa2/puhelinluettelo-frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../puhelinluettelo-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Tommi Saarikangas
